Text: why all the cheats like the oysters and horseshoes?

(om man har en chippad xbox) använd ett ftp program. gå till gta som ligger på hårddisken. sen byter du ut filerna som kommer med alltså  main o script med dom moddade. dom normala filerna verkar vara med men det kan vara smart att ta spara backups på datorn så att du kan byta tillbaks om du vill
Det vore trevligt om någon kunde ta bort fusken ur den här och lägga upp den igen.
Has anybody tried this with the PAL release??
I have the problem that i can´t start the game.i can chose between the normal and mod version,but i can´t go down to start the game,somebody know whats wrong??
Is there any way to play with this files and the trainer togheter?
how do i install this piece of shit release that has no install notes. If your too pussy to make a release with not install notes dont release, bitch.

Since you asked so nicely Boxybrown I took the liberty of translating the instructions edsn wrote:

(if you have an xbox chips) use an FTP program. go to the enigma that is on your hard disk. then replace the files that come with the then mainland o script with them slush. they seem to be normal files with, but it may be smart to keep backups on your computer so you can switch back if you want.

I hope you appreciate it, bitch.
